name: M I X E R ! HTML5
name_original: M I X E R ! HTML5
description:
You are a MIXER! Collect as much fruits as you can to make some delicious smoothies. But BE AWARE of other things...

Controls:

Arrows to Jump or Crouch

Z to Shoot

X to Heal

Crouch and Jump to Super-Jump!

L  Ctrl + R Ctrl to Restore All DATA

The game was made for GamePlusJam2022.
